package.name: darknet_ros
package.description: Darknet is an open source neural network framework that runs on CPU and GPU. You only look once (YOLO) is a state-of-the-art, real-time object detection system. This Ros package is based on darknet_ros package by ETH Zurich Legged Robotics and updated darknet framework by AlexeyAB. https://github.com/leggedrobotics/darknet_ros https://github.com/AlexeyAB/darknet
package.author: Yichen Hu
